## About Me

Hi, I am a Machine Learning Engineer working in fast-paced startup based in Singapore. I have been coding professionally well over two
years in buisness. I have contributed to various open source organizations like Keras, DVC, HuggingFace, fast.ai, Swathanthra Malayalam Computing,
CloudCV etc. I am Kaggle 2x expert and have won best notebook award in a Kaggle competion and got shout out from Jeremy. I like 
to speak and interact with developer community. I have given talk as expert in competence of Machine Learning and Python-core in Pycon India,
a conference attended 1000 people.

I am going to follow an open to contact policy anyone, so feel free to reach me anytime. I am quite easy to reach out via mail, yet feel free to connect
or contact with me in any of social media platforms.
